Name: The Archaeology of Italy
Research Interest: Monuments, material remains, and sculpture and other arts illustrating the development of Greco-Roman and other ancient Italian civilizations to 330 A. D.

Name: Development of Ancient Cities
Research Interest: Monuments, archaeological remains, and histories illustrating the development of the earliest states and urban centers of the Ancient Mediterranean, including Athens, Rome, Carthage, and Jerusalem.

Name: Elementary Modern Greek I
Research Interest: Introductory Modern Greek class, hybrid/blended. This class meets 2 hours per week in class. The equivalent of 2 additional class hours are completed online.

Name: American Race and Ethnicity in the Classical Tradition
Research Interest: Survey of American minority cultures and the reception of Greco-Roman culture in literature, film, and politics.

Name: Nightmares of Nero
Research Interest: Origins and development of selected major genres in Western literature, emphasizing the relationship between classical representatives and their modern successors.

Name: Odysseus and Other Heroes
Research Interest: Study of the heroes of ancient epics in relation to the cultures in which they were produced.

Name: Ancient Greek & Roman Religion
Research Interest: Study of Greek and Roman Paganism and the rise of Christianity within that context.

Name: Vocab Building - GRK & LAT Roots
Research Interest: Vocabulary building assistance for students through an analysis of Greek and Latin roots, prefixes, and suffixes found in English.

Name: Elementary Greek I and II
Research Interest: Introduces ancient Greek (both classical and koine), including the reading of simple prose.\xc2\xa0

Name: Elementary Latin I & II
Research Interest: Whether your goal is to read Caesar or to ace tests like the LSAT or GRE,\xc2\xa0 Latin gives you an edge. Discover the Romans on their own terms and watch your English vocabulary proliferate (\xe2\x80\x9cgrow rapidly\xe2\x80\x9d < Latin\xc2\xa0 proles , offspring).\xc2\xa0

Name: Animals and Literature
Research Interest: A selection of literary texts from Greece. Rome and the subsequent Western tradition in which animals are protagonists or narrators.

Name: Medical Terms-GRK & LAT Roots (Online)
Research Interest: Introduction to the study of the Greek and Latin roots of contemporary medical terminology and to the linguistic patterns governing their combination and usage.

Name: Introduction to Greek Culture
Research Interest: Studies the social and cultural life in Greece during the classical period.

Name: Sex & Gender in Antiquity
Research Interest: Understanding of the place of women in ancient societies can be gained through the examination of the ways in which the ancients conceptualized sex and gender.
